Technical Marketing Manager
Full-time
|
Doctor
|
100 Chestnut St. Fl 3 Somerville MA 02143, United States
Ailux Biologics is the biologics drug discovery division of XtalPi Inc., a global leader in AI drug discovery. By leveraging proprietary AI models and comprehensive wet-lab capabilities, Ailux partners with biotech and large pharmaceutical companies around the world to deliver highly differentiated drug candidates that meet unmet medical needs. We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced technical/scientific marketing professional to join the Ailux marketing team. You will leverage your scientific knowledge and marketing skills to craft compelling technical content and lead marketing campaigns that contribute to lead generation and conversion. With a growth mindset and strong interest in antibody drug discovery, you will play a pivotal role in refining our product strategy and elevating our brand reputation. Key ResponsibilitiesCollaborate seamlessly with R&D, marketing, and BD team to create and deliver impactful technical marketing content, including case studies, white papars, promotional flyers, and other multi-media contentsPlan, execute, and refine digital marketing campaigns to target relevant audience in the industryElevate Ailux's presence in major industry conferences by making presentation materials and posters, and supporting on-site eventsMonitor and analyze market trends to ensure technical contents remain competitive and relevantQualificationsPh.D. degree in biology, biotechnology, bioengineering, or a related field, with a minimum of 2 years of business experience in technical marketing, scientific communication, market research, consulting, or related functions within the life sciences industry. A Master's degree with highly relevant experience will be considered. Extensive research or working experience in therapeutic drug discovery.
